```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
plant.df = PlantGrowth
plant.df$group = factor(plant.df$group,
                        labels = c("Controle", "Tratamento 1", "Tratamento 2"))
ggplot(plant.df, aes(x = group, y = weight)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "grey80", colour = c("blue", "red", "purple")) +
  scale_x_discrete() + xlab("Tratamento") +
  ylab("Peso drenado das plantas (kg)")
```
